messages.title: DEMAND ACTION
messages.content: Are you trying to weigh up which you dislike least? Lib Dems: Austerity cuts and tuition fees. Labour Party: Brexit and no free movement.

messages.title: THIS IS URGENT
messages.content: The NHS won't survive until 2022 with more of the same... We have 4 years left to stop disatrous climate change... The richest must pay fair tax to fund these measures... Send your strongest demand for action - VOTE GREEN

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Reverse the sell-offs and fully fund our health and care.
Freedom to travel, work and study in the EU. 2nd Referendum on our final deal with option to Remain.
We have 5 years left to prevent dangerous global warming. We must act seriously now.
Bring back maintenance grants. Get young people out of debt.

issues.brexitEurope: Freedom to travel, work and study in the EU. 2nd Referendum on our final deal with option to Remain.
issues.economy: The richest must pay fair tax to fund these measures.
issues.education: Bring back maintenance grants. Get young people out of debt.
issues.environment: We have 5 years left to prevent dangerous global warming. We must act seriously now.
issues.health: Reverse the sell-offs and fully fund our health and care.
issues.immigration: Free Movement: Freedom to travel, work and study in the EU.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm a nurse working on the NHS front line. I can see that the NHS simply won't exist as you know it in 5 more years - unless it's fully funded.

images.caption: Stuart Tuckwood speaking to a group of people.

leaflet.additionalNotes: PS: Help us fight for a Public NHS, EU Free Movement and Climate Action.
